item.description:
The All New line up for the January 19th show includes host Sean Sullivan from Comedy Central’s Live at Gotham and the Boston Comedy Festival, Will Smaley, comedy writer for the “Steve Katsos Show” on MyTV Network. Mac Livingston, winner of the Boston Herald’s funniest minute, Tony Moschetto from Comedy Central’s Stand up-Stand up and features special guest Mike Cote -- the headliner known nationally for his Mitt Romney impersonation in the popular GOP TV commercial.

The show, which debuted in 2009, features a revolving lineup of male standup comedians who share different (but very male) observations on the world around them. Over the course of  95 minutes, they share their points of view on wives, mothers, friends, kids, careers, neighbors, growing older, love, lust, Internet dating and other things you won't believe they've wasted time thinking about.

 

Tickets for the Dinner Show are $40 and include a chef prepared Italian buffet dinner in the Salvatore’s Riverwalk Function Facility. Doors open at 7:00 pm for the dinner. There are show only tickets available at $20. Doors open at 8:00 pm for show only tickets. Showtime is 8:30 p.m.  Advance purchase of tickets is recommended. For more information, go to  www.drinkwaterproductions.com or e-mail events@DrinkwaterProductions.com.
item.name: How Men Think(Or Do They?) Comedy Tour
